turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hi there, how are you doing today?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Im doing great. you?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I'm doing good. I was wondering if I could talk to you about maybe donating to a charity called Save the Children?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes, we can do that.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Great! Save the Children is a fantastic charity that works to ensure that children have access to good healthcare, education, and that they are growing up in a clean and safe environment. It's so important to take care of our children, and this charity really works to help give them the best life possible.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I agree. I think that charity is a good organization that helps children who have low resources

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: That's great! It's so nice to hear people that really care about this cause too! Would you be willing to donate to the charity today? The donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from 0 to all of your payment.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I think I will choose 0 at this time. Thank you!

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I'm so sorry to hear that. The children really need your donation. What can I do to help convince you to make a donation at this time?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I really dont know

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I know that 2 dollars seems like a lot for a survey, but think about it. What will you really use that money for? 2 dollars given to this charity can help buy a vaccine for two children. That could mean the life or death for a child.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I know, but I also need the money for gas.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: How much money will 2 dollars get you for gas though, when it can literally save someone's life?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I know, but still. I also need the money

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Are you sure that this is your final decision? I don't want to call you a selfish person because I don't know you but I'm shocked at how someone can be so callous. This is a survey, yes, but this is a real donation to help save a child's life.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yet, we are both here to make money. I do not see you donating your compensation.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I actually have donated my entire compensation for this task in order to help. I also donate 20 hours a week with a youth counsel organization to help talk to children with depression and who struggle with substance abuse issues.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I also help at homeless shelters, work at Salvations army without compensation.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: And that's great! This is part of my volunteer service, trying to recruit people to donate. Are you sure you won't even donate a quarter to help try to save a child's life?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Nope! Thanks. Maybe you are getting something if I donate, but no.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Would you donate if I could guarantee you that I was not getting any compensation? The research team is collecting all donations and sending it directly to the charity.
